summary.short: Efficient and diligent Senior Project Manager with experience in team leadership, project delivery, and programme management.
summary.long: Accountable for team leadership and delivery of online projects and programmes of work across various sectors. Provides oversight to senior stakeholders internally and externally while ensuring projects adhere to PMO-led governance and meet Time, Cost, and Quality constraints.

experience.title: Programme Director
achievements: Developed a new risk management process.
Created a new training program for project managers.

experience.title: Head of Key Accounts & Reactive Project Management
Senior Project Manager
achievements: Delivered a Social Media monitoring system for a major UK Bank.
Delivered a Compliance monitoring system for a US-based client.

experience.title: Project Manager
achievements: Delivered an SMS Balance alert system for a major UK Building Society.
Delivered a Business Account Opening website for a major UK Building Society.
Delivered a Mortgage advice tool for a major UK Building Society.
Delivered a LEAN audit tool combined with productivity monitoring for an international drinks company.

experience.title: Project Manager
achievements: Delivered an Online 360 Safety Appraisal Tool for a Petroleum company.
Delivered an Online Library comprised of scanned/ocr and digital materials for a charity.
Delivered an Award-winning online journal archive for an association.
Delivered a Multinational Book Data system providing Print on Demand resource allocation for a publisher.
Delivered multiple Data Conversion projects utilising in-house tool sets to convert OCR-generated text to XML and SQL for various clients, including a publisher.

methodologies: Lean / Kanban / SCRUM principles and techniques

projects.title: Key Accounts
projects.description: Consistent delivery of projects for 2 key clients ensuring renewal of enterprise license agreements generating revenue in excess of £5 million.

projects.title: MSPR (Strategic)
projects.description: Management of company/client resource to deliver mortgage solution through which all client mortgages are processed. Creation of 2 new online solutions, integration with client systems, enhancements to current BAU systems.

projects.title: Social Media Monitoring (Tactical)
projects.description: Agile project to rapidly deliver a tactical solution (monitoring/responding to Facebook/Twitter) reducing client costs against licensed alternative.

projects.title: Rapid Delivery Methodology
projects.description: Created a tailored method to capture client business requirements, profile them and deliver solutions via the Low-Code platform.

projects.title: Platform Development & Empowering Clients
projects.description: Maximising the value of each project by feeding back to internal teams how the platform is used by clients to deliver business solutions, leading to new platform functionality and performance improvements.
